signup.auth0-users-validation: Something went wrong, please try again later
signup.custom-script-error-code: Something went wrong, please try again later.

signup.invalid-username: Username can only contain alphanumeric characters or: '${characters}'. Username should have between ${min} and ${max} characters.
signup.invalid-username-email-not-allowed: The username cannot be an email.
signup.invalid-username-max-length: The username must not be longer than ${max} characters.
signup.invalid-username-min-length: The username must have at least ${min} characters.
signup.ip-blocked: We have detected suspicious login behavior and further attempts will be blocked. Please contact the administrator.
signup.ip-signup-blocked: Too many signups from the same IP
signup.password-breached: This combination of credentials was detected in a public data breach on another website. Before your account is created, please use a different password to keep it secure.
signup.title: Welcome
signup.username-taken: The username provided is in use already.
